name: Tomb Descent
description:
Are you ready to descend the tomb?
Equipped with one key you need to find your way forward, but beware – you’re not the only one in there!
---------------
Stephen Paice – Programming, UI, VFX, Unity, Level Design
Oliwia Janczewska – 3D art
+ Thanks to Anastasiia Voronina for help by making the mummy!
